name: vestige_002: weak mind-shard of the Dead God
description: [partial decryption start]--- is when you use it to predict anything about itself... don't do that. Anyway, I left it in a pigeon in your office. I have 9 more if you need them. Enjoy! CCHOI: That sounds really dangerous! I'm not using any of this cryptanomolous shit in my projects! KBREWER: What?! Why?! It's totally safe! Only emits 10^-6 DGP, totally safe as long as you don't hook multiple up. CCHOI: I'm not using it until the director files a hazardous material implementation protocol. That's final. Please respect my boundary on this. KBREWER: It's not dangerous if you're careful, but I respect your cautious nature, I'm sorry. We still on for tonight? :) CCHOI: ...yes! and speaking of dangerous, I got that double-IPA y---[partial decryption end]
